face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The solubility increase is not obvious with nonionic surfactants added.
sentences.chinese: 它与非离子表面活性剂复配增溶效果不明显。

sentences.english: Therefore, collectivity design on The Underwater Ship Hull Cleaning Robot is finished.
sentences.chinese: 完成了船体表面清刷机器人的总体设计。

sentences.english: This graphite filled material offers the best bearing surface with hard chrome plated piston rod.

sentences.english: Seemingly, looking in from the outside, I had everything.
sentences.chinese: 表面上看，我拥有了一切。

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam's surface and workshops at the site have collapsed .
sentences.chinese: 紫坪铺水坝的表面出现了裂纹，周围的工场也已坍塌。

sentences.english: They're trying to blast away the face of the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他们试图炸开岩石的表面。

sentences.english: One is a spectrometer that measures sunlight reflected from the Earth's surface.
sentences.chinese: 一个是光谱仪，它测量从地球表面反射的阳光。

sentences.english: Aluminous flower board the surface has punching and plane two kinds.

sentences.english: 27The contoured surface of Jakobshavn Glacier at the fringe of the Greenland ice sheet, on July 19, 2011.

sentences.english: Resizable Main window and some other cosmetic changes.
sentences.chinese: 可调整大小的主要窗口和其他一些表面的改变。

sentences.english: It is an advanced method to study surface nano-mechanical properties.
sentences.chinese: 这是一项先进的表面力学性能的测试方法。

sentences.english: The huge surface area of activated charcoal gives it countless bonding sites.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭巨大的表面积提供了大量的活性位点。

sentences.english: The surface hydrophobicity of coal increases by adsorbing nitrifying bacteria and quinoline in surface.
sentences.chinese: 通过吸附硝化细菌和喹啉在表面增加煤的表面疏水性。

sentences.english: The other end of each clamping sheet, which is different from the clamping flange, is provided with a bulge.
